group_1.textLeft: Ahh, what a let-down~@I thought we would've reached the end~

group_1.textRight: No one lost their life in the end, though?!
We can only thank Iroha Tamaki for that.

group_1.textLeft: Well, maybe you're right~

group_1.textRight: Ao, aren't you gonna go see Iroha Tamaki off?

group_1.textLeft: I'll have to pass; I'm getting kinda tired.

group_1.textRight: ...You don't seem happy at all that things@settled back into peace.

group_1.textLeft: Happy~?
The Union's leader came all the way to visit@the graves,
so everyone's fighting spirit's been dropped.

group_1.textRight: I don't know why, but there's thorns in the way@you said that...

group_1.textLeft: ...Because of Iroha Tamaki, everything's ruined.

group_1.textRight: Um, what were you planning for...?

group_1.textLeft: I was going to pay back my debt and knock them@both out...
...of their pointless fight, but it ended in failure~

group_1.textRight: (It was only for a moment, but... I felt an intent to kill@coming from Ao...)

group_1.textLeft: Well, this brought everyone back together,
so I guess this result's alright~

group_1.textRight: For sure. I want them to be happy!
(As a bystander, I couldn't stop their fight,)
(so Iroha Tamaki coming here really saved them...)

group_1.textLeft: What are you so happy about, Urara?
You were our spy,
so it doesn't matter what happens to us, right~?
Cat's out of the bag~
If you have somewhere else to be,
I think you'd better take off soon before you get@dragged into more.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... That's what I was gonna do.
But, I was worried about everyone in Futatsugi...

group_1.textLeft: What're you, a rubberneck?

group_1.textRight: You're wrong!@I was really, honestly worried...!

group_1.textLeft: Even if you are worried,
if all you can do is stand around and watch,@then this is none of your concern.
Well, unless there's another reason you're so@obsessed with us, that is~
See ya.@I'm busy, so I'm out of here.

group_1.textCenter: (Just as she said...)
(I do seem to have some reason I want to stay with@Promised Blood...)
(I'm sure that must be why Rabi told me@to draw the line.)
But, I don't know how...
Even if I'm staying with them out of regret,@I don't know why that is...
How do I draw the line...?
Urara... If anything ever happens to me,
you think you could take one of my certificates of@honor...
...from Yuna's house, as a memento?
Sakuya...
Sakuya...
That's it...! I finally got it!
(My regret is for Sakuya...!)
(If I can grant Sakuya's request and properly say@goodbye to her,)
(I'm sure my regret will disappear...!)
...Then that means I need to go get Sakuya's@memento...
(...After that, I have to properly say goodbye to my@memories with everyone,)
(visit Yuna's house for the final time,)
(and say goodbye to Yuna and Sakuya...)
...That's my line to draw.
